Package com.qizx.api.util.text

Text-related utility classes, in particular implementations of base indexing Sieves.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultWordSieve Deprecated. use DefaultTextTokenizer
FormatDateSieve DateSieve implementation: uses a DateFormat (by default the short format of the default locale.)
FormatNumberSieve Converts a number using a Java NumberFormat.
ISODateSieve Default DateSieve implementation: recognizes ISO date and dateTime.
LexicalTokenizer Iterator on tokens of a XQuery script.
SieveBase Base class of Sieve implementations.
 

Package com.qizx.api.util.text Description

Text-related utility classes, in particular implementations of base indexing Sieves.
